About DAVID
DAVID is a global creative boutique founded in 2012, with offices in Miami, New York, Madrid, Buenos Aires, So Paulo, and Bogot. The network of agencies  which is a part of WPP and Ogilvy's global creative network  is recognized for its creative reputation, with over 200 Cannes Lions in its history, including Grand Prix and Titanium Lions. It has also earned several EFFIE awards, highlighting DAVID's ability to build strong brands through creativity. DAVID has been named Agency of the Year at some of the most prestigious festivals, including D&AD, The One Show, and The Clio Awards.
The network is responsible for campaigns for major brands such as Google (Android and Google), Mondelez, Coca-Cola, Burger King, AB InBev, Supercell, Netflix, and Kraft-Heinz. Some of its most recent standout work includes iPager (Android), Meet Marina Prieto (JCDecaux), Breathe Through It (Halls), #TurnYourBack (Dove), The Bald Thru (Burger King); and Alcaraz Signs (Netflix). 
Throughout its history, DAVID has been one of the most recognized agencies for creating Super Bowl commercials, producing 9 spots over 6 years. In 2019 alone, the agency created commercials for three different clients (Burger King, Kraft Heinz, Budweiser). 
About the Role  
The Senior Strategist leverages industry knowledge to provide key insights and strategic recommendations for positioning a client's business/products. They will collaborate with the client and internal stakeholders to develop positioning and messaging strategies and are responsible for providing input throughout the creative development process to ensure all client deliverables are on strategy. The Senior Strategist helps define key performance indicators and measurement for programs Ogilvy delivers to ensure that strategies and tactics deliver against client goals and objectives and provide expected returns.  
What Youll Do 

Lead the strategy & brand vision internally and externally   
Develop clear and inspiring creative briefs and an extensive point of view for new business and current clients  
Work with the Strategy Director and Group Strategy Director in brief development, new business pitches and department initiatives  
Partner with Creatives to concept, explore and push the work  
Design and conduct qualitative and quantitative research via focus groups, brainstorming sessions and one-on-one interviews  
Can design for effectiveness and implement measurement strategies   
Collaborate across disciplines and hierarchies  

What Youll Need  

4+ years strategy experience in a creative advertising agency preferred 
Ability to manage scenarios where on the spot, critical thinking is necessary 
Exceptional written and verbal communication skills 
Proactive mindset; cares about the details and follows through  
Well informed on cultural and social trends relevant to clients  
Is current on industry, customer and competitor information and integrates those insights into strategic recommendations

The Role:
We are searching for a highly skilled and motivated Mid-Level Project Manager to join our world-leading creative agency. Your role will be crucial in ensuring the smooth and effective execution of projects from client briefing to final asset delivery. At our agency, we prioritize fostering inclusive environments and encouraging diversity, making it a priority to create an engaging workplace for all team members.
As a Mid-Level Project Manager, your responsibilities will encompass several key areas. First and foremost, you will act as the essential link between various disciplines, leveraging your expertise to bring together the right resources from multiple agencies. Your goal will be to ensure the successful delivery of projects, and you will demonstrate your mastery in effective project setup, budget and resource control, project management, and reporting.
To excel in this role, you should have first-hand experience managing projects across diverse mediums such as TV/video, offline (KVs & print), digital, social, and influencer campaigns. Your ability to focus on both the minutiae of projects while maintaining a broader perspective will be essential. Building strong relationships with the project team, the commercial team, and the PMO Lead will be a priority, as will your commitment to creating an environment that fosters collaboration and excellence.
Your expertise in project management will extend to managing, scheduling, and delivering projects. You should bring experience and an understanding of working on integrated accounts, enabling you to develop a comprehensive understanding of the client's remuneration and commercial model. Maintaining a vigilant eye on the financial status of projects and proactively addressing any concerns related to resource overspend will be critical. Furthermore, your ability to manage schedules, adhere to agreed-upon scope, timings, and budget, and identify and mitigate potential risks will be vital to project success.
As a professional, you will uphold the highest standards in all your work. Your attention to detail and commitment to excellence will be evident in all documentation, costings, briefs, scopes, and presentations. Additionally, your positive attitude and solution-oriented mindset will contribute to creating a constructive and collaborative team environment. You should embrace change and innovation, serving as a champion for the creative process and ensuring the protection and promotion of creative ideas. Recognizing and capitalizing on digital opportunities within project briefs will be an advantage.
In this role, effective communication and collaboration will be key. You will be responsible for scheduling meetings, ensuring the involvement of all relevant team members. It will also be your duty to oversee the review and approval of work before sharing it with the client. Managing resource allocation and keeping the resource manager and PMO lead informed of resource requirements will be critical to the smooth running of projects.
Your contributions will have a significant impact on project delivery and play a vital role in our team's overall success. Together, we can create an exceptional working environment and drive outstanding results for our clients.

Act as the primary point of contact and bridge between various disciplines within the agency.
Ensure the smooth and effective execution of projects from client briefing to final asset delivery.
Demonstrate expertise in project setup, budgeting, resource control, management, and reporting.
Manage projects across diverse mediums, including TV/video, offline (KVs & print), digital, social, and influencer campaigns.

Develop a comprehensive understanding of the client's remuneration and commercial model.
Monitor project finances, forecast resource overspend, and proactively address any concerns.
Manage project schedules and deliverables, adhering to scope, timings, and budget.
Identify and mitigate potential risks that may impact project delivery.
Collaborate effectively with multi-agency teams to ensure seamless project execution.
Acquire and maintain a thorough knowledge of project tools, processes, and platforms.
Schedule meetings, ensuring the participation of all relevant team members.
Oversee the review and approval process for work before sharing it with the client.
Raise purchase orders (POs) for projects, if necessary.
Collaborate closely with the resource manager and PMO Lead to book and manage project resources.
Uphold the highest standards of professionalism, attention to detail, and excellence in all documentation, costings, briefs, scopes, and presentations.

 
Requirements:

Proven experience as a Project Manager in a creative agency or similar environment.
Strong understanding of project management principles and methodologies.
Demonstrated ability to manage projects across various mediums, such as TV/video, offline (KVs & print), digital, social, and influencer campaigns.
Proficiency in effective project setup, budgeting, resource control, management, and reporting.
Experience working on integrated accounts and understanding the dynamics of global projects.
Financial acumen to understand and manage project budgets, monitor financial status, and forecast resource overspend.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to build and maintain relationships with diverse project teams.
Ability to collaborate effectively with multiple stakeholders, including account management, creatives, design, strategy, production, and more.
Strong organizational and time management skills to manage multiple work streams, schedules, and deliverables.
Proactive approach to identify potential risks to project delivery and implement mitigation strategies.
Familiarity with project tools, processes, and platforms used in the industry.
Experience in scheduling meetings and ensuring the participation of relevant team members.
Attention to detail and commitment to maintaining high-quality standards in all project documentation and deliverables.
Solution-oriented mindset and ability to remain positive and constructive in challenging situations.
Flexibility and adaptability to embrace change and innovation in a dynamic work environment.
Understanding of digital opportunities and trends within the creative industry.

Empower your project management expertise and thrive in a collaborative and fast-paced environment.

In partnership with The Coca-Cola Company (TCCC), we are building a new open approach that will connect our talent, skills and client partners in a truly borderless way aimed at multiplying the power of creativity for one of the worlds largest and most beloved brands.
We call our partnership approach Open X  it is the transformation-based marriage of WPP, the #1 global network and largest communications holding company in the world, with the iconic Fortune 100 company, Coca Cola, valued at 71 billion dollars, operating in more countries than the UN and comprised of a diverse portfolio of iconic brands such as Diet Coke, Coke Zero, Sprite, Fanta, Dasani, Smartwater, Minute Maid and Powerade among others.
Within Open X sits Studio X. Studio X unites a suite of marketing capabilities into one fully integrated team of experts. Studio X uses data and technology to make our work more insightful, effective and efficient. Creativity is a proven engine of business growth but creativity must keep pace with the new marketing landscape  which demands it is more intelligent, agile and adaptable. StudioX is our answer to this marketing challenge. StudioX is fueled by intelligent, actionable data-signals and real-time insights.
 
Our teams are populated by a blend of brand, content and social experts: strategists & analysts, creatives & designers, producers & distributors, all committed to making the most of every media moment. We specialise in matching the right content to the right audience at the right moment; supported by best-in-class automation tools to deploy tailored assets at scale. Everything we do is purpose-built for the new marketing landscape: its addressable and flexible, designed to reach data-informed target audiences and to evolve based on their response.
The Role
The Shopper Lead manages and leads all Shopper creative and production for Studio X in Japan for The Coca Cola Company (TCCC). They are responsible for the successful execution of Shopper touchpoints within Studio X including  planning, delivery, overall satisfaction, quality of service, on-time, and on-budget completion of deliverables. They partner to analyze, solve and present viable strategic production roadmaps and solutions to our clients and internally across the WPP network. They champion new and better workflows and work with our global network to test and implement new technologies to uplift our offering. They will partner closely with the Japan Leadership of the broader WPP team supporting the TCCC account.
The successful candidate will use their superior problem-solving skills, judgment, and excellent relationship building skills to be a leader and mentor for the team overall. They can identify and champion great creative work and understand the importance of flawless delivery. They are also strong leaders of teams who inspire others to act courageously.  Additionally, they have a passion for operational efficiency within the production space and are creative in their solutions, as well as a collaborative solutions-oriented approach.

Develop the relationship of strategic, trusted production partners
Engages with teams and partners to gain full understanding of their objectives and requirements, and partners with them to define the scope and production strategy for programs and requests
Curates and casts the most appropriate team through thoughtful resource and capacity
Leverage WPPs global production network to ensure the most efficient, effective and profitable production services are delivered which meet the clients needs

Commercially focused with a passion for delivering and exceeding results
